eidolonunchained.codex.entry.text_exampl: This is a simple text example showing how to create codex entries.
Text entries are the simplest type of codex content. They display formatted text to the reader.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.recipe_exam: This example shows how to display crafting recipes in the codex.
Recipe pages automatically display crafting grids and ingredients.
Recipe pages automatically display crafting grids and ingredients.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.entity_exam: This example demonstrates how to show entity information.
Entity pages can display creature stats, drops, and spawn information.
eidolonunchained.research.undead_researc: Study the mysteries of the undead
